org.apache.pulsar.broker.service.schema.validator

接口 SchemaDataValidator


  • public interface SchemaDataValidator
    A validator to validate the schema data is well formed.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void validate(org.apache.pulsar.common.protocol.schema.SchemaData schemaData)
      Validate a schema data is in a valid form.
      static void validateSchemaData(org.apache.pulsar.common.protocol.schema.SchemaData schemaData)
      Validate if the schema data is well formed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • validateSchemaData

        static void validateSchemaData(org.apache.pulsar.common.protocol.schema.SchemaData schemaData)
                        throws InvalidSchemaDataException
        Validate if the schema data is well formed.
        参数:
        schemaData - schema data to validate
        抛出:
        InvalidSchemaDataException - if the schema data is not in a valid form.

      • validate

       throws InvalidSchemaDataException
        Validate a schema data is in a valid form.
        参数:
        schemaData - schema data to validate
        抛出:
        InvalidSchemaDataException - if the schema data is not in a valid form.
